provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Act may be cited as the Obeah (Amendment) Act, 2013, Short titIeand
and shall be read and construed as one with the Obeah Act construction.
(hereinafter referred to as the "principal Act") and all amendments
thereto.

                        (2) A sentence pursuant to section 3 or 4 of the principal
                  Act which­
                       (a) is handed down prior to the commencement date; and
                       (b) imposes whipping as the whole or a part of the sentence
                           shall not, to the extent of the whipping only, be carned
                           out in whole or in part on or after the commencement
                           date.
                         (3) In this section "commencement date" means the date
                  on which this Act comes into operation.
